content.prompt: The authorâ€™s argument regarding the effects of Western philosophy on the world is likely based on which of the following?

choices.label: The technological innovations of Greece and Rome
The global spread of Christianity as a result of European trade and conquest
The adoption of European Enlightenment political and scientific principles worldwide
The globalization of popular European postmodern philosophy

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
